description: DEPRECATED: A collection of (shelf) locations, the forth-level location unit. This is a read-only proxy to the new locations interface at /locations that should be used instead.

shelflocations.description: DEPRECATED: List of (shelf) locations, the forth-level location unit. This is a read-only proxy to the new locations interface at /locations that should be used instead.
